Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அன்புடைமை ஆன்ற குடிப்பிறத்தல் வேந்தவாம் பண்புடைமை தூதுரைப்பான் பண்பு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The qualification of an ambassador are affection (for his relations) a fitting birth, and the possession of attributes pleasing to royalty.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: An ideal envoy stands before a king. Three distinct qualities are visualized around him.
Layered_Composition.Midground: A glowing heart symbolizes his love and loyalty to his own king ('அன்புடைமை'). A noble, ancestral banner behind him represents his good birth ('ஆன்ற குடிப்பிறத்தல்'). His own refined, pleasing demeanor and attire represent the character that kings find agreeable ('வேந்தவாம் பண்புடைமை').
Layered_Composition.Background: A royal court, where these qualities allow him to operate with confidence and success.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The three essential qualities of an ambassador: loyalty, noble birth, and a pleasing, courtly character.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The three qualities are represented by clear, distinct symbols: the glowing heart, the ancestral banner, and the refined appearance.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A regal, golden light that befits a royal court. The envoy is illuminated in a way that highlights his three key attributes.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A full-body portrait of the envoy, capturing his dignified stance and symbolic qualities.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with the rich detail of a classical portrait.

Negative_Prompt: disloyal envoy, common-looking envoy, awkward demeanor, text artifacts.
